abstract: HSBC said in a statement that the bank and U.S. buyout group Lone Star have extended the deadline for HSBC’s purchase of Korea Exchange Bank.
lead_paragraph: HSBC said in a statement that the bank and U.S. buyout group Lone Star have extended the deadline for HSBC’s purchase of Korea Exchange Bank.

headline.main: HSBC and Lone Star Extend Deadline for Korea Bank Deal
